name: Chess Connect - GMTK Gam Jam 2021
description:
A good old regular game of game of chess... Or is it?  Try selecting a piece before you move another one and see how the tables turn!

Credits:

  • Noah Pellicci - Sound Design/Composition
  • Finn Künkele (da Finnci) - 2D art/Assistant Programming
  • Antoine Ferry (AnFer) - Programming
  • Clafiuti - Assitant Composition
